name: Justified text on Medium
description:
In case you dread left-aligned text as much as I do.
For now, this should justify paragraphs and list items.

I wish the platform would let us set text alignment directly though.
additional_info: This is a very short code and very easy to tweak in case you find it doesn't cover as much content as it should. I haven't tested it thoroughly so it might not take effect on some kind of text. Specially if they update the site's frontend.
